description: Angular component for displaying product information as a card with actions to add to cart or view details.

classes.name: ProductCardComponent
classes.description: Angular component representing a product as a card with UI for adding to cart and viewing details.

methods.name: addToCart
methods.description: Event emitter triggered when user clicks 'Add' button to add product to cart.

methods.name: view
methods.description: Event emitter triggered when user clicks on the card or 'Details' button to view product details.
